title: Hour 2: Warrior Worries?
description:
Kendrick Perkins, Jay Williams, Bart Scott, Dan Orlovsky and Joe Fortenbaugh talk about their best NFL bets for the weekend, the Lakers two-game winning streak and who hands the Eagles their first loss?

itunes:subtitle: Is it too early to worry about the 3-5 Warriors?
